historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 40-1414.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-97, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-1631.

Miscellaneous Notes

Approval of proposed schedule of fines: Pursuant to Resolution 8-150, the "Commercial Bicycle Operators Licensing Act Schedule of Fines Approval Resolution of 1989", effective November 21, 1989, the Council approved the proposed schedule of fines for violations of the provisions of the Commercial Bicycle Operators Licensing Act of 1987.

DC CODE § 50-1634

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor shall promulgate a schedule of civil fines not to exceed $50 for violations of the provisions of this subchapter and rules promulgated pursuant to § 50-1632(d)(3).

The proposed schedule of fines shall be submitted to the Council of the District of Columbia within 60 days of March 29, 1988 for approval, in whole or in part, by resolution. Nothing in this subchapter shall affect any requirements imposed upon the Mayor by subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)
